newsitem.title: USA: U.S. wheat weekly export sales highlights -- USDA.
newsitem.headline: U.S. wheat weekly export sales highlights -- USDA.

text.p: USDA wheat export sales highlights in latest reporting week:
Sales of 408,800 metric tons (MT) were 3 percent lower than the previous week, but 45 percent higher than the 4-week average.
Major increases were reported for Japan (160,400 MT), unknown destinations (57,500 MT), Egypt (45,500 MT), and Mexico (38,600 MT).

Exports of 462,800 MT were 62 percent above the prior week and 53 percent over the 4-week average. The primary destinations were Japan (181,100 MT), Pakistan (70,300 MT), Armenia (51,500 MT), and Mexico (34,600 MT).
